content.detailedDescription: I was operating a max train northbound along i205 and somewhere between foster road and powell blvd i saw a woman with a stroller on the bike path that parallels the tracks holding up her phone, filming something in the sky. i looked and saw four spherical orbs in a chevron formation traveling southbound just south of portland, oregon. the orbs were much larger than aircraft warning lights and were perfectly spaced from one another. it looked like they were traveling south above the river valley. they were moving as fast as, if not faster than an airplane. unfortunately i was only able to look for about five to ten seconds before i lost sight due to my direction of travel and my responsibilities involving the safe operation of the train.
content.summary: 4 spherical orbs in a chevron formation travelling southbound just south of portland, oregon

content.detailedDescription: The kids and my mom had just pulled up in the driveway at home that night after pta when one of my daughters spotted a helicopter and stated it was an airplane. after a few seconds of debate she realized she saw the propellers. ahead of the craft i noticed a new set of lights that reminded me of an airplane but before i could say, "see child, there's an airplane", it had descended down (above the trees) super fast and disappeared into nothingness." within an instant i realized at that speed it was destined to crash, also i realized it couldn't be a plane at that speed. how did it dissapear? and did i just see that? before i could open my mouth my mom said, "did you see that?" i replyed, "did we both really just see that?, so you just saw that, what did you see?" i asked to varify my sighting. "it just dissapeared",she remarked. i couldn't believe it took twenty-two years to see another ufo. this time it was so quick it was unbelievable. if my mom had not have caught those lights in her periphial vision in just enough time to see the lights dissappear from her view before even  making out what we were looking at... i don't know if i would have believed my own eyes and mind. i'm pretty sure the helicopter pilot saw it because they were approaching from above opposite direction. i couldnt believe mom finally got a chance to see one. one oppertunity missed her in 1996 when my dad, mom, and brother who was on his way to a mlitary acadamy, were driving down to clinton,nc. my dad said maybe she wasn't meant to see it because she never once turned her head while the incident was taking place. they were on the highway and quite unusually their were just two cars, them and a green van. he noticed that the car was keeping exact pace with them. in the back seat was my brother. ironically, i suppose in the van the father was driving, the mother the passenger and a boy around the age of ten or twelve was in the back seat. the parents in the van never once turned their heads to look over at my father. however he noticed when he would pick up speed so would they. as so when he declined speed, so would the other vehicle as to keep alolngside of the vehicle. the boy in the backseat smiled mockingly and stretched only his neck, but a good twelve inches. my daddy said he then stepped on the gas and they did not persue. my dad swears on poppa's (his own father's) grave that what he told me was the truth. when i was twelve in the fall of 1989, while standing on my front porch next to the dixie classic fairgrounds staring into the sky, spotting the north star, big and little dipper, i noticed there were two north stars. one brighter than the other. except one of them was not in positon of the north. after spending a few wandering moments pondering on how this was not that north star but that one was. and trying to figure where this star came from, i thought i would turn around reach my head into the door and call my father quickly who was sittng just two feet from the door. but i knew i couldn't turn my head because that wasn't suppose to be there. before i could open my mouth to say daddy, come here, the craft made three immediate quick movements in the sky. a very wide precise triangle path as it dissappeared into the atmosphere opposite the direction of the sky it was in. i found it amazing the speed at which it could abruptly change directions. out of this world, literally!
content.summary: Debating with the kids whether it's an airplane or helicopter when in front of it (helicopter) we noticed another set of lights and it dissapered into no where.

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba acostado solo en la terraza de mi casa mirando la noche despejada eran como las 8:30 pm, hab���an muchas estrellas, de repente mientras miraba hacia arriba vi lo que parec���a un meteorito dorado sin forma, me asuste mucho porque cre��� que iba a caer cerca, entonces me levante de inmediato, sent��� que mi coraz���n estaba a latiendo muy r���pido del susto, el objeto avanzaba r���pido en direcci���n norte - sur a la velocidad de una estrella fugaz, cuando mire el objeto a un angulo de 45 grados, este tomaba forma triangular y vi como se mov���an sus alas lentamente de arriba hacia abajo y antes de desaparecer en las monta���as giro un poco a la derecha y luego a la izquierda
quede anonadado varios segundos y sal��� corriendo a contarles a los de la casa lo que hab���a visto, no se si me creyeron, sent��� tristeza de haber sido el ���nico de haber presenciado eso.
content.summary: Objeto que al principio parecía un meteorito ardiendo pero mas grande de lo habitual

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west bound on i-20, just south of mesquite around noon when i saw an unknown size, grey, rectangular object to the north/ north west. my view of it was side-on. when i saw it, passengers in the car with me believed it was a blimp, but i knew that it was too big, and of the wrong shape. i know it was at a distance of 1-3 miles, as it was sort of hazy, about like the dallas skyline was at that distance. the object appeared three-dimensional, but its width i am not sure of. it didn't seem to have any lights. the sighting ended as i moved toward my destination in a neighborhood with trees and two-story houses.
content.summary: Gray, rectangular craft hovering, perhaps moving slowly over mesquite, tx

content.detailedDescription:
Occurred : 1/4/2004 14:30 (entered as : 01/04/2003 14:30)
reported: 1/5/2004 7:39:33 am 07:39
posted: 1/17/2004
location: fort myers, fl
shape: disk
duration:1 minute
((nuforc note: we regard the person who submitted this report to be exceptionally capable, and we suspect he is an excellent observer and reporter of fact. he has served as an expert witness in courts of law, and he has an exceptionally strong technical background. we believe this report is quite reliable in the information it presents. pd))

a silver disk with a bulge on one face, maybe 30 feet across, reflected sunlight and bobbed around at 3-5000 feet.

we saw an airborne silvery disk-shaped object, maybe about 30 feet across, highly reflective, at about several thousand feet in the sky (just below some clouds in a clear blue sky, 80 degrees f., easterly breeze, i believe) it appeared almost the size of the full moon to our relative view.

it was very clear, razor sharp in our view.

when it turned sideways it was very thin, and as it turned, it's "bottom" surface appeared shaded, and it's highly reflective upper surface showed a wide, low bulge nearly filling the diameter.

it was definitely a disk, and definitely nearly flat on it's "upper" and "lower" surfaces.

it was seen above mcgregor and summerlin avenues, fort myers florida, at about 2:30 pm, and we watched it for about a minute.

it behaved like a balloon, drifting and turning, climbing and dipping, bobbing weightlessly, in a more or less easterly direction, for several hundred feet problably, and did not appear to be under "control" or "doing" anything.

it was big.

it was absolutely a disk.

our view of it was very clear, and it was definitely "hardware," not a cloud, etc.

it was not a round weather balloon or a party balloon.

i was not alone. i did not notice any other motorists watching it, and traffic moved on, and we lost our view of it.

nearby air fields are: paige field, and sw florida international airport. this occurred in or near the landing path for some of the air traffic.

((nuforc note: we have spoken with this witness on approximately six occasions, and we consider him to be an exceptionally well-qualified witness. he is a trained observer, and has served as an expert witness in courts of law. he has made an attempt to locate other witnesses to the event, but has not been successful, to date. pd))

upgrade to prior fort myers florida report - peter d., please see e-mail of today

the object appeared to be of rigid construction, and did not flex or otherwise deform as it gyrated through pitch, roll, yaw, etc..

there was no visible "weather balloon" radiosonde package or parachute attached. it did not rise up to a higher altitude or disappear from sight.

a subsequent lightly conducted search of internet sites selling professional weather balloons, and large advertising balloons (national and international) and other possibly related items, found nothing similar, so far.

actually, it appeared during this lightly conducted search that weather balloons might not even come in "hard" silver, or at least i have not yet found any.

weather balloons do come with telemetry packages and parachutes which are strung below the balloon on longish cable. this object has none visible.
==========================================================================
reported to mufon by email, 12/2/11:

i am a 66 year old former private investigator and courtroom certified expert witness to photos and video. at one time i emplyed 125 people.

i was taking insurance photos of my florida home prior to a hurricane, sometime around 2004 when i captured the attached image of an unknown black object at the ceiling of my house.

* * it had not been visible to my unaided eye when i took the photo. i only noticed it in the picture much later.

okay, i know it looks like a fraud hockey puck on a string. its not; i'll say this once: if i had wanted to construct a hoax i could have made it less hoaxed looking.

i note how it appears solid and reflects light. it is not a camera artifact; i tried but could not reproduce it.

it is not somehow a repeat of the sink stopper below it on the sink.

i have a second shot of it in a different positiion, blurred as if moving. the shots were a few moments apart.

i have sent it out to maybe a dozen venues for comment but no one has gotten back to me.

a few weeks prior to this incident i had reported a ufo to one of the websites. it had been an object i saw in the sky along with a witness in my car. it was a clear and hard as a car in a parking lot. it struck me as a silver disc, black on the bottom, some sort of decontrolled surveillance device. it rolled and banked slowly like a ferris wheel. when traffic moved we left it behind in the sky at about 3000 feet above fort myers florida.

(a few years later i found an illustration of it, a ratheon hard balloon surveillance device "being developed.")

at the time, i reported it to the sw florida international airport because it was close to the  approach path. i was referred to an faa answering machine. a few days later a mr. smith or jones called to say there had been nothing in ghe sky at that time. he told me to report it to the ufo website, which i did. 

can you help me out here?

when i show these pics to anybody their eyes glaze over. even if they accept it as real, the implications seem ungraspable to them.

i grasp that i may have reported a classified surveillance operation that had gone out of control due to some nearby radio towers which were present. i grasp that i may have been investigated by some sort of other advanced surveillance device. i know the government withholds advanced science for around 30-50 years, and i think this was an advanced surveillance platform using some sort of invisibility 


(link moved to fi report box) cms 12/19/11 19:32 cst flg

the website operator stated on his site that i was very credible and invited me on the air for that night with art bell, but i declined.

im sending this to you because i saw your video and image expert on tv today. is it d'antonio?

would you please investigate this? i have photos of the thing in my house.
content.summary: T was very clear, razor sharp in our view.  when it turned sideways it was very thin, and as it turned, it's

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving between portglenone & bellaghy in ireland on sunday 18/12/11. my wife was driving, i was in the passenger seat and two 12 year old children were in the back seat. my wife drew our attention to a flashing blue light directly ahead on the horizon approx 1 mile. at first we thought it was an abulance on the hill in the distance.It then shot across just above the horizon & stopped at a position of 9 o'clock in relation to the car. it had stopped flashing at this stage and stayed completely still for approx 2 seconds. it then shot across to a positon of 7 o'clock,stayed still for approx 1 second then dissapeared. my wife saw the object shooting off but did not see it stop as she was concentrating on driving. myself and the two children observed the rest of the movements.
there was no noise and the visibility was very clear. the speed was incredible, if you blinked you would have missed it moving. the size of the object was difficult to guess as it never got closer to us than approx half a mile.
content.summary: Flashing blue light shot across horizon, stopped twice then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was in boulder out on a little hike & noticed 2 glowing orbs. after watching them for a few minutes, one vanished & i began filming. during the video, as far as i can tell, there isnt anything visible on camera much after 3 minutes in, but it was still visible by eye. i was almost reaction-less, it seemed unreal. here is the video i have.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

contact [email redacted/cms/tg] for any questions
content.summary: Multiple ufo's glow above colorado

content.detailedDescription: Orange sphere pulsating over near mountain
content.summary: Orange sphere pulsating over near mountain

content.detailedDescription:
I normally would never do this, but i feel as though these things should be reported in some way, for the simple purpose of recording them.

to begin, i have recently become attuned to certain aspects of esp (unintentionally). i mention this because seeing this object brought on a familiar psychological reaction that would normally come with intense concentration on a fellow human or object. the mere sight of this object made me drawn to it; where i had to observe it relentlessly. this was before i realized it was a ufo.

i was gazing up at the stars on a clear, cold night when i noticed an especially bright light. it had the appearance of a star, when viewed from a distance, though there was a certain glow and aura emitting from it. having caught my eye, i positioned myself in a vantage point that allowed me to monitor slight movements of the object (by contrasting it with a nearby rooftop in my line of vision). 

after a few minutes, i determined that the object wasn't a plane due to it's weird vertical and horizontal hovering motions. the nearest airport that would require a plane to hover for an extended period such as this was over 60 miles away.

there seemed to be a small trails of light coming from the object, forming what looked to be a boomerang type shape (or a rounded mountain top). the light trails would taper off on each respective end of the boomerang.  the trails themselves gave off a spectral rainbow glow (this glow is what caused the object to catch my eye in the first place). 

the object slowly moved out of my view, so i went outside my apartment for a better vantage point. i re-spotted the hovering light and continued to observe it. after a few minutes, i decided to run into my apartment and grab my camera. returning outside no more than 30 seconds later, the light was completely gone. for some reason, i knew this would happen. the instant i walked inside the feeling that i had felt left me and i knew the object would be gone upon my return. i checked around the rest of the sky and there was no trace or sign of the light. the total time of observation was approximately 10-15 minutes, while the object itself had already been hovering in the sky when it was spotted.

i've never seen or have expected to see a ufo before this sighting.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in the upstate this morning

content.detailedDescription:
5 ufo(s) flying stright line from laguna beach, flew  over newport coast,  head toward the ocean and go up vertically.
i am pilot and i know an airplane when i see one and none of these object has an airplance, chopper or jet flight characterstic.
content.summary: 5 ufo flying stright line from laguna beach, go over newport coast  head toward the ocean and go up vertically

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on quarterfield road in severn maryland when i noticed on my left about 7 orange lights hovering in the sky. it looked like an upsidedown cone with an orange dim light coming out of the bottom of it, changing in brightness slightly every few seconds. it stretched from the treeline to high in the air. it looked very similar to the big dipper. (3-4 orange dots in a row then 4 in a diamond shape) after a few minutes it slightly changed shape and was more in a line again. i kept driving and managed to get under it and it disappeared entirely until i drove back the other direction and they were visible again. i drove down telegraph road and took a short video of it through the trees, then pulled down past severn run where it looked to be hovering over that general area with people standing in the field under it looking up at it. a few seconds after that it was gone again. (i assume it passed over us like when i drove under it)
content.summary: 5-7 cone-like orange lights overing over severn maryland in a line

content.detailedDescription: I was at home when i stepped out back and as i frequently do looked up at the night sky and saw this very bright round object.At first i thought it was a plane,where in  the path of alot of air traffic from norfolk international,but the more i stared at it i realized it was much brighter than any plane or object for that matter that i have ever seen moving in the sky.It had a twinkling star look to it.I tryed very hard to see any strobe lights as to rule it out as a plane but saw none.I motioned for my dad to step out and he also saw the object,we both observed what i would call a normal passenger plane passing lower and in a south to north track to said object.In comparison the passenger plane was much duller[it had the usual lights of any passenger plane ive seen at night]and probably 1/4 the size of object.I would guess the object was somewhere between 40k and 60k feet in alltitude.When me and my dad lost sight of object behind the trees,we watched it till you couldn't see it anymore.We both felt that it was too big,bright, brilliantly vivid of a white glow to have any normal explanation for.
content.summary: Bright star like object

content.detailedDescription:
i was off-roading with three other jeeps at the rausch creek park in tremont, pa yesterday, 12/17/11. i did not notice the sphere while on the trail, but after checking back through the videos that we took, i noticed it.

see [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

it's probably a reflection from within the jeep. but, i have not been able to figure it out since the video was not taken from within my jeep.
content.summary: Spherical object shows up hovering and moving from a video. link attached.

content.detailedDescription:
I happened to be outside and was loading my family into the car. it was around 9 pm, clear sky with stars above. i was about to go into the car and happened to look up into the sky and saw an object, a light, possibly star-like moving in a horizontal line. it appeared out of nowhere and was traveling faster than a regular plane...I would estimate more than 700 mph but less than 3000 mph. the elevation is unknown but appeared to be about 1 mile up. 

the object appeared for several seconds then disappeared. i could not see it anywhere at all. i also did not see a tail which would indicate a comet or shooting star.

i excitedly told my family who all came out of the car but we did not see anything else.

we then left for our late night dinner appointment.
content.summary: Starlike object moving faster than plane appeared for a few seconds

content.detailedDescription:
On the day of july 24th, 2011 and i was outside with my brother, and 3 other people. one was a friend of mine that i met when i was in middle school and two others that lived close from my house. over the summer we hanged out in my garage, had the garage door open and we would sit at times outside in my ally.It was late nothing excising was happening, sky's as clear as can be. it was getting late about 3:ooam when i had the urge to look to my left, i turn my head and to my astonishment i see gold! it literally had the color of gold illuminating off the orb which was solid,  shaped like a oval/disk with a dome on top. whats even more strange is that i seen the craft and it was silver but it illuminated golden color from itself to a point were the gold color looked like a aura around the silver craft.After turning my head to the left i guess it seen me and started to move,fast, my adrenalin kicked(never had such a intense adrenalin rush, first thought in my mind is my friends and brother are not going to see and believe me because this thing reacted fast. my next thought was to yell at the top of my voice to get the attention of both my brother and my friends,even though they close to me, i yelled and pointed at the thing yelling "look dammit look, to the left above the wires by the light pole, %&#king look were im pointing. do you see that please tell me you are seeing this s%@t" i went trough all that in almost one second i had to respond quick because as soon as i seen it; this craft increased glow and started quickly swinging to the left and right of itself.Each swing to the left and right increased it's speed. the craft rocked back and forth 4-5 times. it was going so fast that a tail started showing,  was glowing more and more intensive. once the first swing came in and then the second the thing started to produce a tail like a meteorite but its tail glowed like it was creating its own light. first thing that came to my mind is this thing is speeding past the speed of light, hitting the air so fast that plasma/fusion was being created from the heat of the acceleration of this spacecraft. glow was getting more intense, what we noticed was that all five of us felt as if we were looking at god. glow was so bright but not throughout the sky and only in were it flew trough. by now were like 8 secs into looking and the hair on my back is up in the air. you could feel a strong static energy flow and even hear it,heard quick pulses never experienced anything like it. the craft then changed direction and was going up and down then a super swift left turn;by now the craft is past any speed i can even comprehend.. i said "this must be going at least 100,000mph maybe more". shocked at what were looking at and at the fact we heard no noises, just static,fast pulsing. then once it made that left turn i swear on everything the craft shot up so fast that the light from the craft itself bend and like the thing went past the speed of light. like it kicked in some type of drive and left earths atmosphere. after it was gone and its tail was dispersing and going out like light going out slowly.. 
we still felt the static.. we did not say a word besides "wow" for a good five minutes then we started talking about what we just saw. two of my other friends that were there would never believe this if they were not there. there hood so "ufo" is a joke to them but both of my friends had fear in there eyes. shaking as if they just witnessed the end of the world. one said " no that wasn't a ufo, it was a government secret aircraft drone.. he soon cleared up his head along with my other friend. now they look into the skis everyday. my friend from middle school was just shocked and all he was saying "wow now i believe you, at first i  thought you were bs with the ufo sighting that you had 6 years ago. that was at the same time,but six years apart. difference is that i seen a golden sphere egg shaped disk with 4 round windows and i seen someone in those windows as my neighbors, family seen it.This also happened at 3in the morning(don't know what day). was a long time ago and i was still kinda young that time but i got so scared that i ran into the house and prayed it was a dream but it wasn't i woke up and people told me what we saw.  
i also want to talk to someone about myself its very important and would want someone who can help me out this year for me has been crazy michigan is the place to come to if you wanna see a ufo ive seen over this year about 11 of them.. last time i saw something was 6 years ago.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 5 witnessed a craft, possibly breaking lightspeed

content.detailedDescription: I was at an outoor social event when someone pointed out a strange flying object approaching from the distance. witnesses agreed that it looked like a giant golly doll. it appeared to be black with some red on the lower parts. after it had passed about half a mile away from us it became apparent that it was tall and thin in profile. at least 8 people saw it and nobody in the group offered any plausible explanation as to what it was and none noticed any sound from it. after it had passed its side profile became apparent - it was like a vertical rectangle. it continued on straight-line course apparently at a steady altitude of perhaps 500-1000ft before it went out of sight beyond buildings in the distance. a lot of more people must have seen it. if i only seen the front view of it i would have thought it was a strange-looking helicopter or balloon but the lack rotors and this side profile with no tail and the lack of audible sound somewhat negates the helicopter theory and as for it being balloon and thin side profile makes me think doubtful about that. somebody must know what it was.
content.summary: This airborne golly-shaped object was seen by at least 8 people.

content.detailedDescription: On 12/17/2011 at approx 0605hrs i was warming up my vehicle getting ready to babysit for a friend.  as i was in reverse pulling out of my driveway i noticed a light, i looked out of the passenger side window and did not notice a vehicle headed in my direction. i immediatley noticed to my right and as i continued to pull out of my vehicle right ahead of me approx 100 ft just above the tree line a triangle shaped ufo.  the ufo appeared to have been coming from the right as i first saw it and changed its direction to the left flying strait ahead from where i sat in my vehicle.  at first before it changed its direction i only noticed a bright white light.  after the direction changed i could see the entire bottom which had one bright white light on the front and two in the back and one red flashing light in the middle of the two white lights in the back.  i heard no sound emitting from this aircraft and only noticed it because of the light.  it did not appear to be at a fast pace.  i did not notice it speed up or slow down. it continued on its path in the same pace.  i then turned on a road heading in the same direction and tried to keep a visual with it on my left but lost sight of it.  in my mind i tried to debate it, i see planes in this area all of the time but they fly at a much higher altitude and i could still hear them.  this craft was very low just above the tree line with no sound and a flashing red light.  this lasted about 2 min.
content.summary: Triangle ufo spotted in hopewell va

content.detailedDescription:
Manchester, england, night time. i was in a parked car with another person when i noticed two points of white light like bright stars moving slowly at the same speed in a parallel straight-line heading which i believe to be about north-west, one ahead of the other. i thought maybe it was two aircraft i opened the car window and leaned out to get a better view. i then noticed almost directly above me was a third, similar light which formed an equilateral triangle with the other two. one light was leading and the other two following, both the same distance behind. all appeared to be at the same altitude and the distance between them appeared to be rigidly fixed, in other words they were moving as a unit but in the darkness i couldn't see any interconnecting structure between them. i couldn't hear any sound from this. 

the lights didn't noticeably flicker, shimmer or illuminate anything. i told the person with me what i was seeing but they weren't able to get a clear view from their position. i watched the lights continue with no change of speed or direction until they had all disappeared over the treetops about half a mile away. i couldn't get the strangeness of what i'd seen out of my mind so the following morning i called the manchester airport and was put through to the watch. i reported what i'd seen and was told that there was no aircraft activity in that area at that time. they were not able to offer any explanation.
content.summary: Three points of white light in a horizontal equilateral, triangle formation passed slowly and silently overhead on a straight line heading.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch looking at the early evening sky when i noticed a huge star. at least at first i thought it was a star till it started moving. it was very large and a very bright white light. it was just behind a tree line which is what made me really notice the movement. i would get a clear view of it then it would almost play peek a boo with you. still unsure of what i was seeing i got my husband to clarify that it was moving. still thinking at this point it was a plane or helicopter i grabbed my high power binoculars to look for the classic blinking lights. instead i saw the huge white light no pulsing but the white light was surrounded by a greenish blue color not visible with the necked eye.  i obseved this strange left then right up than down flight of this object for over an hour till it was no longer visible. let me just say right now that i have watched this same sky my whole life! i know ever star, planet, satellite, plane, comet, helicopter, and shooting star. this was nothing like i had seen in my life!!!! on the other hand it was something i have waited my whole life to see. later around 11pm i again went outside out of pure curiosity to gaze at the sky. in the same general direction as the first encounter there were 2 moving almost in tandome this time. one was way way way up in the atmosphere and almost did look like a satellite. the second object was following behind the first and seemed much bigger and brighter. i continued to watch them clime into the heavens until neither was visible. planes don't do that and satillites follow a clear flight path. i am not the only one seeing these strange moving lights in sc!!! last night an hour before my first sighting a woman in polk county florida had also seen something similar.  i had posted on earth sky on facebook trying to get a logical answer. they tried to tell me  it's venus. ummmm i know venus and sorry it does not move left to right up then down. when i stated that in my post they never replied again. like i stated before i know this sky!!!! that was not suppose to be there!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought i was looking at a huge star till it started to move. when i would pinpoint it again for a better look it would move again. saw with binoculars not a plane, satellite, helicopter, or planet. husband and child witnessed also.2 retuned at 11pm acend
content.locationName: Greenville is 30 to 45 mi, South Carolina

content.detailedDescription: Not necessarily a sighting. every saturday at 9:40 or so it sounds like timed bombs going off. last my mother said do u hear that isaid yes as soon as she said that it made what sounded like thunder then it it stopped as if they heard us talking about it. very faint boom noise can be heard over everything ur doing, yet very faint and timed. it wigs me out.
content.summary: Faint yet noticable timed boom sounds like artillery rounds hitting ground, which is wierd because traffic noise ussually drowns out any other noises besides jets going to detroit metro airport n romulus.

content.detailedDescription: This object had no flashing lights. it was changing shape.And from it's appearance it was holding something or changing it's shape to accommodate something. it is only visible at a distance and under magnification. there is no aircraft visible before or after. the pictures were taken in quick succession.
content.summary: Captured between 3 frames of pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on a partly clear night letting the dogs out when i happened to see the object hovering in the sky between cloud cover, it just caught my attention. i first thought it was a projection, but it being so cold and in an area where projections wouldn't make sense, i immediately knew it wasn't one, as there was no trail of light from projection, and why would it be such a weird looking projection? could not be. it had 6 bright white lights and was formed in a circle shape, and they would move slowly from side to side, maybe 50 feet in between. it lasted for about 8 or so minutes and then just disappeared. i've never seen anything like it before and am still shocked what i saw because i never thought anything like it would ever happen to me. strange for sure, just vanished.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 circular lights in a circular rotation moving from side to side then vanishing

content.detailedDescription: Okay i was out back in the open garage smoking a cigaret. but i haven't just seen one iv seen like 4 just in the past month at least just the ones i can make out but iv seen what my friend says is the silver lining but the very first one i saw i was with a friend and me and him were walking out back and their it was i new right away what it was because i am a major ufo junky i wanna be a ufologist when i get older. but the first one i saw was a triangular one with white lights at etch corner and a orange light in the middle i cant remember the 2 or but the 3rd time i saw what  think is a mother ship because it was huge and their was other little ufos coming out the bottom and one just shooted across the sky over my head but the 4th sieting was today just a few hours ago but it was what i think the normal kind of ufo with a dome and a oval body it was letting out little red orbs from the bottom of it and the first one that came out shoot back into the sky and the second just came out and diapered and a could see a beam of light shining out from under it just like every other one and their were a lot other little one that would line up in a line and just shine a light on one another and blink like they were communicating and i think thats the silver lining. i think some one should serestly give me a call and come out here for a couple of days because every day their at-lest one or 2 ufos out here.
content.summary: Orbs came out of it

content.detailedDescription: I was in saint paul, minnesota getting into my car when i glanced up and saw a redish-orange light/fireball flying in my direction. at first i dismissed it as a ufo because i live with a few miles of an international airport, but as the light/fireball got closer and closer, there was no noise. it flew in  a perfectly straight line and after a few minutes, the light/fireball was so far away, i just couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Redish-orange fireball traveling from nw to se.

content.detailedDescription:
Was flying south to north-west......The object was glowing red with no sound
it was at least going 15-30 mph
content.summary: Was red , no sound

content.detailedDescription: myself and my brother were outside havin a smoke and like always we were lookin up. without a sound in the sky from behind the roof of the house a light no more then a 200yrds away at about 500ft agl appeared. first it was just one  reddish orange light with a red light inside it and a yellow light just above it. as we moved toward it across the yard two more came into sight. the three lights were either three independent objects or one large v shaped craft. if it was one object given how far i was from it, i would have to say it was larger then a football stadium. it was moving north to south at i would think no more then 50mph and after about 5 to 10 seconds the first light kinda faded away. the other two lights when they got to the same point in the sky were the first light disappeared they faded away in the same way the first light did. this took place on 12/17/11 at about 20:20 with little to no cloud cover. the only sound i could hear was a jet that just took off at t.F green airport about 7 or 8 miles to the south east of were i was when it all went down. the plain i heard flew  through the flight path of the object no more then a minute after it disappeared.
content.summary: Saw three lights moving north to south then they faded away.

content.detailedDescription:
This afternoon shortly after 6pm cental time i was out in my driveway i had just finished changing oil in my truck.I live in an open country area where i have a big view of the sky and it is really clear sky tonight.I noticed something bright to my north and starting watching it when i realised it was coming straight in my direction.When it got close enough where i could get a good look at it it looked like a ball of fire and flying in a straight line really low so i ran to my front door and called for my daughter and her friend to see it . they came outside and we filmed it with our phones,we were in disbelife and it scared my daughter really bad for some reason.We looked at the video and paused it on a still shot and blew it up and it appears to be a cylinder shape crazy looking.My first thought that it was a plane on fire or a missile just the way it flew and looked it concerned me so much i called the local sheriff dept.To ask if anyone else had seen what we saw or if something was going on and they had no reports.
     i went back to what i was doing back out in the yard still thinking about what we saw trying to make since of it about ten or fifteen minutes after we saw the first one i walked out in the open field where i had a totally open view of the sky and here comes another one in the distance i ran for the house and got my daughter and her friend and we ran back out in the open and she filmed this one to with her i phone it came right over us this one was real low low enough when i looked straight up i could see like three big circles of like fire under it it looked like fire on both of them but it wasnt dont know how to describe it.This object was very big and very low and fast but so clear . it just appeared from no where like the other one but they had to been following each other same exact flight paths just the second one was really low and came over just like the first one and they both went a ways south and just vanished . this time i was freaked out i called the sherif back and tried to get them to see if any of their officers could see it and one officer came by my house but no more came i really wanted him to see it bad they said he would put the word out for them to keep an eye on the sky.We live right close to a bunch of chemical plants thats why at first i was worried about it being a missle or something but the pics rule that out for sure.And no i dont do drugs or drink at all not even socially this was the scariest but neat thing ive ever seen for sure for some reason its all i can think about now thats why i shared it with yall .
content.summary: I was outside and saw what looked like a ball of fire coming a it flew right over me with no noise at all and abot 10- 15 mins. later a second one came but was really low,

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside in the backyard enjoying our firepit when i noticed a bright light traveling from the mountains to the east.  i thought it was an airplane preparing an approach for landing at dia, but, the light got brighter and did not have any colored lights on the bottom.  i pointed it out to my wife and as we watched, the bright light changed directions and went north, rather quicklyly. as it went north the light dimmed quickly to a small glow and the size of the light shrank to the size of the visible stars and then poof, it was gone.  total length of sighting was maybe 1 minute 30 seconds.  
we live in arvada, co and are used to seeing lots of plains as they approach dia occassionly from the west. i thought it was a plane at first, but it was too bright and the light too big and it changed directions way to fast, ewat then north.  then i thought it was a satelite but they don't change directions on a tight line?????
was cool seeing something that makes no sense.  btw, i am reporting this 25 minutes after seeing it.
content.summary: Sitting by firepit, bright object traveling east then changed direction and went north.  was very bright then dimmed and vanished.  not a plane and not a satelite.  familiar with both, in dia landing approach lain in arvada, co
